description: Domino's Pizza website was the subject of Robles v. Domino's Pizza LLC, a landmark accessibility lawsuit. Court documents identified critical WCAG violations that prevented blind users from ordering food online. Benchmark tasks focus on the core ordering workflow.
tasks: Order a large pepperoni pizza for delivery to your address using the Domino's website.
Browse the full menu and customize a pizza with at least three toppings, then add it to your cart.
